ex.util.search
Interface PathConstraint

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<PathConstraint>
public interface PathConstraint
extends java.lang.Comparable<PathConstraint>

This interface is to be implemented in order to perform lattice search with custom constraints imposed on the path(s) to be found. E.g. to allow only up to N objects of a certain type on a path, PathConstraint will need to track the number of these objects on the path fragment created so far. Only 1-best is supported for constrained search.
